thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lithia Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $2.15

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lithia Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $2.15
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Lithia Motors Inc:
* LITHIA REPORTS RECORD FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.15 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.56 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 18 PERCENT TO $2.7 BILLION * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $10.50 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $11 BILLION TO $11.5 BILLION * QTRLY TOTAL SAME STORE SALES INCREASED 3% * QTRLY NEW VEHICLE SAME STORE SALES INCREASED 3% * QTRLY USED VEHICLE RETAIL SAME STORE SALES INCREASED 2% * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $9.85, REVENUE VIEW $11.14 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.09, REVENUE VIEW $2.70 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* DECLARES DIVIDEND OF $0.27 PER SHARE FOR Q4 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
